sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Cǐwài, wǒ hái yǒu yī gè wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: En outre, j'ai encore une question.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In addition, I have another question.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jiàn shì wǒ méifǎr bāng nǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je ne peux pas t'aider pour cette affaire.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I can't help you with this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il faut se brosser les dents matin et soir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You should brush your teeth morning and night.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a terminé la tâche en premier.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He was the first to complete the task.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Elle a versé des larmes.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: She shed tears.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zài tā yǎn lǐ, tā shì zuìměi de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: À ses yeux, elle est la plus belle.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: In his eyes, she is the most beautiful.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì zhège guójiā de wáng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est le roi de ce pays.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is the king of this country.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est diplomate.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is a diplomat.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il fait froid, mets ton manteau.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: It's cold, put on your coat.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai perdu mes clés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I dropped my keys.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je veux devenir médecin dans le futur.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I want to be a doctor in the future.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā fā le yī tiáo xiāoxi gěi wǒ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il m'a envoyé un message.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He sent me a message.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est parti silencieusement.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He left silently.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le temps passe vraiment vite.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Time passes really fast.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā xiě le yī piān wénzhāng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a écrit un article.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He wrote an article.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Allez retirer de l'argent à la banque.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please go withdraw money from the bank.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette valise est très légère.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This suitcase is very light.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen tán yī tán zhège wèntí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Parlons de ce problème.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's talk about this issue.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 中国是亚洲最大的国家。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhōngguó shì Yàzhōu zuìdà de guójiā.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Chine est le plus grand pays d'Asie.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China is the largest country in Asia.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La Chine a 1,4 milliard d'habitants.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: China has 1.4 billion people.
